Title: Endless Forms Most Beautiful
Writer: John Fawcett (created by), Graeme Manson (created by), Graeme Manson, Tony Elliott (story editor), Chris Roberts (story coordinator), Alex Levine (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Rebecca Sernasie (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Kim Coghill (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Peter Rowley (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Jeff Detsky (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Andrew De Angelis (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Elize Morgan (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Adam Higgs (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Bob Mackowycz Jr. (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident)
Actors: Tatiana Maslany, Dylan Bruce, Jordan Gavaris, Kevin Hanchard
Plot: Dr. Leekie offers deals to both Alison and Cosima. Sarah meets Rachel Duncan. Delphine tries to make amends. Alison tries to get her life back together. Helena escapes.
